title: olympick
author: olympick
content: Chrome Cdm API & Chrome Extensionhttps://i.ibb.co/h9g0tvG/Whats-App-Image-2023-07-20-at-03-20-10.jpgAfter being scammed on the forum in search of a working Widevine Chrome CDM I finally found the only developer who can break Chrome's Widevine and sell it.He sells both the chrome extension and the access API.I'll be leaving this topic open for you to answer if the negotiation went well and if his service works.I'll be posting the telegram channel, he uses to update customers about the service.Telegram Channel:@chromecdm
